snippet: A humorous campaign for segments of SH 130, a toll road in Texas, tries to encourage drivers to try it instead of their regular route.
lead_paragraph: A humorous campaign for segments of SH 130, a toll road in Texas, tries to encourage drivers to try it instead of their regular route.

headline.seo: Ads Hope to Ignite a Fine ‘Roadmance’
headline.main: Ads Hope to Ignite a Fine ‘Roadmance’
headline.print_headline: Ads Hope to Ignite a Fine ‘Roadmance’
